publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1205 Mr Andy Kerr: Transport (Scotland) Bill: Order of Consideration-That the Transport and the Environment Committee consider the Transport (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: Parts 1 to 5; and that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.

S1M-1205 Mr Andy Kerr: Transport (Scotland) Bill: Order of Considerationâ€”That the Transport and the Environment Committee consider the Transport (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: Parts 1 to 5; and that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.
